title: ‘I Do Well in Races of Attrition’: Kristen Faulkner Refreshed for Run at Zürich Worlds after Olympic Whirlwind
content:
A mid-season escape to the Colorado Rockies gave her space to reflect on her double-gold Olympic Games and to reload for a season-closing run at the rainbow jersey: 'It will be a race of attrition.'

Read the full article at ‘I Do Well in Races of Attrition’: Kristen Faulkner Refreshed for Run at Zürich Worlds after Olympic Whirlwind on Velo.
author: ahood
